headline: The Hartford Insurance Group, Inc. (HIG): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on The Hartford Insurance Group, Inc. on Value investing subreddit by ProudlyRegarded. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on HIG. The Hartford Insurance Group, Inc.’s share was trading at $132.31 as of August 29th. HIG’s trailing and forward P/E were 12.02 and 11.44 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. […]
